deskill.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to remove or reduce the need for skill in a job, usually by changing to machinery
deskill.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to remove or reduce the level of skill needed to do a job, usually by getting a machine to do some or all of the work
deskill.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Advances in machine technology had deskilled numerous manual jobs.
